sentences.sContent: He was revolted by the smell.

remMethod.val: re(反) + volt(转) → 反转 → 反叛， 反抗

words.tran: 背叛地；讨厌地；令人恶心地
反叛，造反；起反感（revolt的现在分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 反叛，反抗；违抗；厌恶，反感
trans.tranOther: if people revolt, they take strong and often violent action against the government, usually with the aim of taking power away from them

trans.tranCn: 起义， 叛乱， 反抗
trans.tranOther: a refusal to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws
